name: Never Leave your Buddy Behind!
description:
Never Leave your Buddy Behind!

Submitted for GMTK Game Jam 2021, this game is built around the theme "Joined Together" and thus the premise is as follows:

You play as the pair Carrot and Berry, and are using them to increase your Score, jumping from platform to platform. Neither can be away from the other for too long, so be sure to keep them close!

Controls
  • WASD/ Arrows to Move
  • Space To Jump
  • Tab to swap between Berry and Carrot
  • ESC to Pause.
Background Music:

Ping Pong from https://www.purple-planet.com
